title: NFL Calls Jon Gruden’s Lawsuit Over Leaked Emails ‘Baseless’ in Motion to Dismiss
sub_head: The former Las Vegas Raiders coach sued the league and commissioner Roger Goodell alleging they were behind the leak of years-old offensive emails sent by Gruden
body:
The National Football League said in a court filing Wednesday that a lawsuit by former Las Vegas Raiders coach Jon Gruden, which blames the league for leaking emails that lead to his exit as coach, is “baseless.”
Gruden sued the NFL in November, alleging the league and commissioner Roger Goodell had orchestrated his downfall by releasing years-old emails in which he used offensive language. Shortly after those emails were reported, first by The Wall Street Journal, Gruden resigned.
